pr_title: Code quality/increase coverage of device installation service

timeline.message:
Added new tests for the DeviceInstallationServiceTest class

Coverage has been increased to 95.6%

- Using AssertJ and mockito
- Removed verify usage and replaced all with argument captors

replies.bodyText: move the licence header to the top
replies.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: Remove this line; the default strictness is better.
timeline.author: robindenadel
robindenadel
robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: give this field a descriptive name like argumentMessageType
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: give this field a descriptive name like argumentIpAddress
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: give this field a descriptive name like argumentPriority
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: Since we are going to check the values in the assert part of the tests, it is clearer to create constants for testIp, testUid, testOrganisation, testDevice and testMessageType. Furthmore, create a constant for testMessagePriority with value 1
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText:
Since
new RequestMessage(
"testUid",
"testOrganisation",
"testDevice", null);
is used in other tests, refactor it to a constant. If other tests use other parameters, refactor it to a method.
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText:
Since
new CorrelationIds("testOrganisation", "testDevice", "testUid")
is used in other tests, refactor it to a constant
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: Refactor the building of a response message to a method and use that method in other tests as well
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.message:
- Added License Header
- Renamed some fields
- Added response message creation method
- Refactored some repeatedly used objects into constants

timeline.bodyText: Formatting not ok, check your IDE settings
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: Which part of the formatting is not okay?
replies.author: MithraicMagic
